channel.title: Teleports
channel.description:
ok when i use a teleport it said that i have to have runes and have a certin lvl in mage can someone help me remove that so anyone can use the teleports without runes or a certin lvl?
ALSO: if someone can help me change the teleport icon :D

item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

Look in teleport.cfg

//-----TeleName-RTID----MLvl----Runes---Rune1---Rune2---Rune3---Item----TeleX---TeleY---Height--XP------R1Amt---R2Amt---R3Amt---ItmAmt
Tele = Varrock	0	25	3	556	554	563	-1	3213	3425	0	5	3	1	1	-1

change the rune ammounts which are the 3 laws etc. replace with 0
and your done.

Read full topic
